attributes.action: Have a full economic impact report on the closure of Filton Airport on the UK aircraft industry.
attributes.additional_details: BAE Systems is closing Filton Airfield and turning it into housing. this puts at risks 1000's of jobs at Airbus etc as aircraft now have to have be transported by ship rather than flown out. David Cameron likes claiming credit for selling Airbus aircraft but we risk losing another world leading industry because of the governments inaction.
